name: Spellbook
description:
2-Player fighting game with the goal of using your spells to knock your opponent upwards and outside of the arena.

If you stand on the ground boxes will continually push you up eventually taking you out so you have to jump off them to avoid that but keep in mind that you cant use your spells while in the air.

requires 2 controllers and 1 friend.

- created by @terakorp
